fusetools.financial_tools.ThinkOrSwim¶

class fusetools.financial_tools.ThinkOrSwim[source]¶

Bases: object

ThinkOrSwim API.

Methods

authenticate

Creates an authenticated ThinkOrSwim API session object.

pull_quote_history

Pulls price history for a stock ticker.
classmethod authenticate(token_path, api_key, chromedriver_path, redirect_uri='http://localhost:8888/callback')[source]¶

Creates an authenticated ThinkOrSwim API session object.

Parameters

  • token_path – Path to API token on disk (if exists or where to save).

  • api_key – ThinkOrSwim API key.

  • chromedriver_path – Path to chromedriver executable on disk.

  • redirect_uri – Redirect url for web authentication.

Returns

Authenticated ThinkOrSwim API session object.

classmethod pull_quote_history(authentication_object, ticker, start_date=None, end_date=None)[source]¶

Pulls price history for a stock ticker.

Parameters

  • authentication_object – Authenticated ThinkOrSwim API session object.

  • ticker – Stock ticker to pull quotes for.

  • start_date – Start date of data to pull quotes for (optional).

  • end_date – End date of data to pull quotes for (optional).

Returns

Stock quotes JSON response object.
